meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a geek.
meanings.sent1: She wore geekish glasses and a pocket protector.
meanings.sent2: His geekish love for technology was evident in his collection of gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The geekish enthusiasm for comic books was contagious.
meanings.sent4: Her geekish dedication to coding was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with geekish memorabilia from sci-fi movies.

meanings.definition: Showing an interest in or knowledge of geek culture.
meanings.sent1: He had a geekish passion for Star Wars and Marvel movies.
meanings.sent2: Their geekish conversations about video games lasted for hours.
meanings.sent3: The geekish trivia night at the comic book store was a hit.
meanings.sent4: She had a geekish knack for solving complex puzzles.
meanings.sent5: The party was a gathering of geekish fans of fantasy novels.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a socially awkward or obsessive manner.
meanings.sent1: His geekish tendencies made it hard for him to make eye contact.
meanings.sent2: She had a geekish habit of correcting people's grammar in casual conversations.
meanings.sent3: The geekish focus on his project caused him to forget about lunch.
meanings.sent4: Their geekish dedication to cosplay was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent5: The geekish excitement over the new video game release was palpable.
